import React from "react"; import "./RoomDetail.css"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import p9 from "../imge/img-9.jpeg"; import MapProductDetail from "./MapProductDetail"; import firebase from "firebase"; import styled from "styled-components"; const Like = styled.button` background-color: #00bfac; border: none; padding: 10px; color: white; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 700; height: 33px; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 20px; `; function RoomDetail() { const { itemID } = useParams(); const [item, setItem] = React.useState({}); React.useEffect(() => { firebase .firestore() .collection("product") .doc(itemID) .get() .then((docSnapshot) => { const data = docSnapshot.data(); setItem(data); }); }, []); function toggleCollection() { const uid = firebase.auth().currentUser.uid; if (isCollected) { firebase .firestore() .collection("product") .doc(itemID) .update({ collectionBy: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.arrayRemove(uid), }); } else { firebase .firestore() .collection("product") .doc(itemID) .update({ collectionBy: firebase.firestore.FieldValue.arrayUnion(uid), }); } } const isCollected = item.collectionBy?.includes( firebase.auth().currentUser.uid ); return (
``
{item.name}
★{item.stars} (5 comments)
⌲{item.locationDetail}
♥︎ Add to wishlist
Hosted by Victor Chen
{item.comment}
${item.price}
Campsite area
Park at listing
Canvas tent
Essentials
Pets allowed
Campfires allowed

No wifi
Pack out
Showers
Potable water
Details
Check in:After 3PM
Check out:Before 12PM
On arrival: Meet and greet
Activities
Offered on the Host's property or nearby.
Biking
Boating
Hiking
Padding
Swimming
100 Reviews
★4.5
Victor
This was exactly what we had hoped for...off the grid and disconnected. The hosts were friendly and it was unbelievably quiet. The only recommendation I would have is a new shower liner. I would absolutely book again!
2021/11/2

This was exactly what we had hoped for...off the grid and disconnected. The hosts were friendly and it was unbelievably quiet. The only recommendation I would have is a new shower liner. I would absolutely book again!
2021/11/2
{/* */}
); } export default RoomDetail;
